___[0-9]+.description: summary values for an individual cluster

items.description: cluster center - median based - along each dimension

___existence.description: probability that the cluster is true/false positive - if either value is missing, it is equal to 0

___0.description: 'probability' that the cluster is a false positive

___1.description: 'probability' that the cluster is a true positive

items.description: number of users who have viewed this subject for this workflow/task, regardless of whether they marked this cluster

oneOf.description: instructions related to a marking task
